title: shrI pArvatI paramEshvarau
sahitya:
shrI pArvatI paramEshvarau vandE cid-bimbau lIlA vigrahau mamAbhIShta siddhayE


caraNam   ApAda-mastakAlankArau Adi madhyAnta rahitAkArau sOpAna mArga mukhyAdhArau
sukhapradau gandha rasa AdhArau lOpAmudrEshArccita caraNau lObha mOhAdi vAraNa
karaNau pApApaha paNDitatara guruguha karaNau bhayaharaNau bhavataraNau
